sentences.en: Employees enjoy the kudos that the job brings as much as the financial rewards.
sentences.cn: 雇员喜欢工作带来的荣誉如同喜欢金钱上的回报.

sentences.en: For programmers, the kudos of a successful contribution is its own reward.
sentences.cn: 对于程序员来说, 成功的方案所带来的荣誉本身就是奖赏.

sentences.en: He acquired kudos just by appearing on television.
He got a great deal of kudos for his work at the university.
sentences.cn: 他在大学里贡献良多,得到许多荣誉.

sentences.en: He received kudos from everyone on his performance.
sentences.cn: 他的表演受到大家的称赞。

sentences.en: I hope to keep in touch and continue your hard Kudos!
sentences.cn: 让我们保持联系,继续努力用功,祝一切顺利.

sentences.en: It will acquire no kudos for translating its inner doubts into hesitation.
sentences.cn: 如果由于内心疑虑不安而在行动上举棋不定,是得不到荣誉的.

sentences.en: Kudos to you and the show's producers & correspondents for bringing these criminals the light.
sentences.cn: 我要赞扬你,也要赞扬栏目的制片人 和 记者们,感谢你们曝光这些罪犯.

sentences.en: Kudos to you; you richly deserve the recognition.
sentences.cn: 恭喜您得奖; 这是您应得的报偿.

sentences.en: She did most of the work but all the kudos went to him.
sentences.cn: 工作大部分是她做的,可是荣誉都归他了.

sentences.en: Sigma Kudos is a global company that develops world - class product information for its clients.
sentences.cn: 科多斯是一家全球性的产品信息公司.

sentences.en: The film has also earned kudos for respecting the audience's intelligence andtaking theout.
sentences.cn: 影片也因为尊重观众的智慧,绝无投机取巧,敷衍了事而赢得了赞赏.

sentences.en: the kudos of playing for such a famous team
sentences.cn: 为这样著名的队比赛的荣誉

sentences.en: There was considerable kudos attached to being on the advisory board.
sentences.cn: 能跻身于顾问委员会是个莫大的荣誉.

sentences.en: When receiving kudos, for instance, publicly thank everyone who helped you.
sentences.cn: 例如,在获得名誉的时候, 公开感谢曾经帮助过你的所有人.

trans.tran_en: the state of being admired and respected for being important or for doing something important
